title: Soredemo Tsuyoku, Daitekure.
original_name: それでも強く、抱いてくれ。
sinopse:
Akio feels sick at the station, Yanagizawa helps him—to get rewarded by a bulge of vomit. After that, he blackmails the poor student Akio with a foto, taken in a very delicate situation. How will their relationship develop?

(Source: MU)
